title: School board member stipends haven’t changed in over 40 years. That could change with a new bill

California has not raised limits on board compensation since 1984; some maximums were as low as $60 monthly.
A bill, waiting for the governor’s signature, leaves it to local boards to decide whether to raise their rates.
